overview: An outrageous comedy for all ages, much beloved health guru Jack Strong is abducted from earth along with some of his students and transported to FAT PLANET, where food is worshiped and everything is getting bigger, and unhealthier, by the pound. Jack's mission is to teach the entire planet the benefits of eating healthy and getting in shape, while trying to make it back home to earth.
tagline: They needed help, not more helpings
title: Fat Planet
